posts.message:
Introducing Egyptian Geeks Archive
http://egyptian-geeks.github.io/EgyptianGeeksArchive/
As we discuss over a month ago our plans to provide the content of this group in a searchable, publicly accessible format, it's available now. 
Thanks to Kareem Kashwaa who created a C# application to export the content from Facebook in JSON format.
I've created a simple Javascript website that reads the JSON and display the content using a Handlebars template.

Please check out the site. Tip: use the post date to go to post details, then from post details, use post date again to go to original Facebook post.

Submit bugs and ideas in the GitHub repo
https://github.com/egyptian-geeks/EgyptianGeeksArchive/issues

Check out all the code on our new GitHub home
https://github.com/egyptian-geeks

To do:
- Better design.
- DONE Fix date display (seems like all dates are today's).
- DONE Add user pictures.
- Add search box.
- whatever you want....
... more issues are already added to issues
https://github.com/egyptian-geeks/EgyptianGeeksArchive/issues
